Author: SmolCoffeeCat
Text: It depends on your activity level and your tdee. There are calculators where you can find out what your bmr and your tdee is. Your bmr is your basic metabolic rate, so basically how many calories you burn just that your body functions. Your tdee is what you need daily, including movement etc. So if your tdee is over 1000cal then you would still lose weight if you only consume 1000cal per day
